Instruction: Cook zucchini slices in a large pot of boiling water until they are tender; then drain them well.
Saute onion and garlic in olive oil in a skillet over medium heat until the onion is tender, for about 2 minutes.
Mix zucchini, onion, and garlic in a 9x12-inch casserole dish; pour marinara sauce over the ingredients and stir well. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
